languages.text: "Эти игры не мои, а Теодоры. И мы играем в них даже после ее смерти. Я не враг тебе, а верный слуга".
"These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."
languages.original_text: "Эти игры не мои, а Теодоры. И мы играем в них даже после ее смерти. Я не враг тебе, а верный слуга".

traits.locale_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."
"These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."
"These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."
"These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."
"These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."
"These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

languages.text: «Son los juegos de Theodora, no los míos. Y aquí estamos, jugándolos incluso después de su muerte. No soy tu enemigo, sino un sirviente fiel».
languages.original_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

traits.locale_text: «Son los juegos de Theodora, no los míos. Y aquí estamos, jugándolos incluso después de su muerte. No soy tu enemigo, sino un sirviente fiel».

languages.text: “这是西奥多拉的游戏，不是我的游戏。即便是她死了之后，我们依然被困在这场游戏当中。我不是你的敌人，我是你忠诚的奴仆。”
languages.original_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

traits.locale_text: “这是西奥多拉的游戏，不是我的游戏。即便是她死了之后，我们依然被困在这场游戏当中。我不是你的敌人，我是你忠诚的奴仆。”

languages.text: 「これはシオドーラのゲームで、私のゲームではない。そして今、彼女の死後もなお、私たちはそのゲームを続けている。私はあなたの敵ではない―私はあなたの忠実なる下部だ」
languages.original_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

traits.locale_text: 「これはシオドーラのゲームで、私のゲームではない。そして今、彼女の死後もなお、私たちはそのゲームを続けている。私はあなたの敵ではない―私はあなたの忠実なる下部だ」

languages.text: "Das sind Theodoras Spielchen, nicht meine. Und wir stehen hier und spielen sie selbst nach ihrem Tod. Ich bin nicht Euer Feind ... sondern Euer treuer Diener."
languages.original_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind Theodoras Spielchen, nicht meine. Und wir stehen hier und spielen sie selbst nach ihrem Tod. Ich bin nicht Euer Feind ... sondern Euer treuer Diener."

languages.text: « Ce jeu, comme vous dites, ce n'est pas le mien, mais celui de Théodora. Et, voyez-vous même, nous continuons à jouer selon ses règles même après sa mort. Je ne suis pas votre ennemi, bien au contraire. Je suis votre fidèle serviteur. »
languages.original_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

traits.locale_text: « Ce jeu, comme vous dites, ce n'est pas le mien, mais celui de Théodora. Et, voyez-vous même, nous continuons à jouer selon ses règles même après sa mort. Je ne suis pas votre ennemi, bien au contraire. Je suis votre fidèle serviteur. »

languages.text: "Size ben değil, Theodora oyun yapıyor. Bakın buradayız, o öldükten sonra bile oyununu oynamak durumundayız. Ben düşmanınız değilim, sadık hizmetkârınızım."
languages.original_text: "These are Theodora's games, not mine. And here we are, playing them even after her death. I am not your enemy — I am your loyal servant."

traits.locale_text: "Size ben değil, Theodora oyun yapıyor. Bakın buradayız, o öldükten sonra bile oyununu oynamak durumundayız. Ben düşmanınız değilim, sadık hizmetkârınızım."
